reviews.review: it was a total chaos. You will suffer from difficulty of breathing and early stage of anxiety. The film is an epic. It will go down as a CLASSIC!

A film that will make you laugh but also cry at plot twisting marvelous moments this movie lives upto the hype and more. Marvel fans will go mad for it and first timers will still feel emotional when leaving the cinema as this movie leaves you with questions and anticipation for its sequel. Incredible action scenes throughout the movie with comical dialogue from all characters involved who all get a fair amount of screen time needed to bring this film together and keep the plot rolling. Thanks as the big bad of marvel will leave you satisfied a villain that has a goal to make a better universe before it destroys itself, his quest for the infinity stones gives you fear for the heroes but also somehow manages to make you feel sympathetic at times for the big bad titan. Just an incredible film which satisfies its audience but also leaves you excited for the MCU's next big films.

Action, story, audio, visuals... this film did the impossible. I thought it was going to be a mess as many of the places it takes set are so far away and unrelated to each other but they pulled it off amazingly. This is the new standard for action films.
All I'm saying is I'm really really _really_glad I saw it early as I'd hated to have seen any spoilers WHEW !
What an amazing movie! Should of been rated R
Probably one of the best movies I've ever seen

Brilliant spectacle which balances the ridiculously large cast with ease, perfect transition from each story arc, a villian who has character, depth and invoke fear which is unheard of up until now. An excellently crafted story, portrayed flawlessly by the case of each story arc right up until the climactic cliff hanger and one of the best post credit scenes yet from Marvel. Miss this at your peril, should go down as the best Marvel, if not super hero film in history.

Although the length of the film is quite long you will soon forget that and be driven in the amazing story characters and humour. the relationships were well played out and i am EXTREMELY satisfied.amazing movie
one of my favorites avengers movies
this film has a storyline like a roller-coaster and has a natural humor
